name: Seongku Kang
content: SeongKu Kang SeongKu Kang I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Korea University. I received my Ph.D. from POSTECH, where I was advised by Prof. Hwanjo Yu. I was honored with the Stars of Tomorrow award from Microsoft Research Asia, where I interned in the Social Computing group. After completing my Ph.D., I worked as a postdoctoral researcher at UIUC, working with Prof. Jiawei Han.
